properties.Name: Dingmans Falls Visitor Center
properties.Note: Park information, exhibits, bookstore, NPS passport cancellation, restrooms, drinking water, accessible Dingmans Creek Trail to Silverthread and Dingmans Falls, guided waterfall walks. www.nps.gov/dewa

properties.Name: Park Headquarters
properties.Note: Park information, NPS passport cancellation, America the Beautiful and park passes, restrooms, drinking water, wildlife viewing platforms, McDade Recreational Trail access. www.nps.gov/dewa

properties.Name: Kittatinny Point Visitor Center
properties.Note: Park information, exhibits, bookstore, NPS passport stamp, restrooms, drinking water, view of Delaware Water Gap, Appalachian National Scenic Trail access, other trails nearby, boat launch, and canoe launch. www.nps.gov/dewa

properties.Name: Millbrook Village
properties.Note: Park information, exhibits, museum shop, historic buildings and landscape, historic life-skills demonstrations, NPS passport cancellation, restrooms, trails nearby. www.nps.gov/dewa

properties.Name: Foster-Armstrong House
properties.Note: Park information, exhibits related to Montague area, public programs and tours. (Operated by partner organization) www.montaguehistory.org

properties.Name: Nelden-Roberts Stonehouse
properties.Note: Park information, exhibits related to Montague area, public programs and tours. (Operated by partner organization) www.montaguehistory.org

properties.Name: Peters Valley School of Craft
properties.Note: Park info, art gallery & store, artist demos, and self-guided village tours Sat & Sun (Operated by partner orgranization) www.petersvalley.org

properties.Name: Pocono Envrionmental Education Center
properties.Note: Park info, exhibits related to plants & animals, bookstore, public education, and group programs, trailhead, sensory trail (Operated by partner organization) www.peec.org

properties.Name: Rosenkrans Museum
properties.Note: Park info, exhibits related to historical Walpack Center; open dawn to dusk (Operated by partner orgranization) www.walpackhistory.org

properties.Name: Van Campen Inn
properties.Note: Park info, house tours and trailhead www.walpackhistory.org

properties.Name: Mohican Outdoor Center
properties.Note: Park info, Appalachian Nat'l Scenic Trail access, year-round rec programs, basic lodging and camping facilities. www.outdoors.org/lodging/lodges/mohican
